Articles.Content:
keep on going pete!!!!! the effort you are making is tremendous and allow me to say it is looking absolutely gorgeous!!! I am doing the huge effort of waiting for a stable, official release before I try everything out and I am starting to bite my nails a bit too much!!!

we all really appreciate what you are doing, RSS is not the same without your work!

Edited August 17, 2015 by pvnkb1tch

keep on going pete!!!!! the effort you are making is tremendous and allow me to say it is looking absolutely gorgeous!!! I am doing the huge effort of waiting for a stable, official release before I try everything out and I am starting to bit my nails a bit too much!!!

we all really appreciate what you are doing, RSS is not the same without your work!

Thank you, it means allot

Yes, I also can't wait for the conflicts with RP-0 to be fixed so I can install RVE again... Earth without clouds looks so dull, I don't even want to play Once all is done and working between RVE, EVE and Scatterer, things should be the most gorgeous experience to be had in KSP.

Now I need to find my time machine to shorten the wait.

Yes, I also can't wait for the conflicts with RP-0 to be fixed so I can install RVE again... Earth without clouds looks so dull, I don't even want to play Once all is done and working between RVE, EVE and Scatterer, things should be the most gorgeous experience to be had in KSP.

Now I need to find my time machine to shorten the wait.

Yeah, i'm waiting for the RP-0 compatibility update too

Yeah, i'm waiting for the RP-0 compatibility update too

Ahh ok, to be honest I had actually totally forgotten about that, I'll look into it tonight or tomorrow

Ahh ok, to be honest I had actually totally forgotten about that, I'll look into it tonight or tomorrow

Cheers!
Got RVE, RSS, RO working well together and about 30 more mods.

Got RVE, RSS, RO working well together and about 30 more mods.

http://i.imgur.com/pWN4zmP.png

Wooo!

I want these effects in stock KSP!!! GURRHLKLCLKAHLK lol.

Seriously though I would love for those clouds to be included in my upcoming film (I forget if I sent you a PM on that or not... if I didn't please tell me PingoPete xD)!

I want these effects in stock KSP!!! GURRHLKLCLKAHLK lol.

Seriously though I would love for those clouds to be included in my upcoming film (I forget if I sent you a PM on that or not... if I didn't please tell me PingoPete xD)!

I did indeed... thought I replied?

Great mod !

Can't use it because I'm running KSP on a potato, but still a great mod

Keep up the good work !

The not so finished city-night texture. Honestly the hardest part to modding RVE is the damn cities, finding a balance between what looks acceptable from 1 but also 130km without repetition and without an 8k texture D:

You can see the pixelation issue and the repetition here:

EDIT: How do you guys feel about this much repetition? Is that acceptable or should I keep experimenting?

Edited August 16, 2015 by pingopete
Looking good Pete. Looking really.. really good.

The not so finished city-night texture. Honestly the hardest part to modding RVE is the damn cities, finding a balance between what looks acceptable from 1 but also 130km without repetition and without an 8k texture D:

http://i.imgur.com/nSSSbPt.png

You can see the pixelation issue and the repetition here:

http://i.imgur.com/Q3sDOyO.png

EDIT: How do you guys feel about this much repetition? Is that acceptable or should I keep experimenting?

It's definitely acceptable in my eyes, if you want to disguise the repetition more then you could add additional cross streets. The really big street going diagonal and the one branch off of it These:

Are on the repetetive side but the only really way I would fix it is by adding additional streets to make those less present... but the texture is already very busy... GUR! xD If only there was a way to tile the texture and rotate it at a random 90 degree angle... that's how I would break the repetition.

This reminds me a ton of when I edited textures in Minecraft while attempting to keep them well tile-able.

...

In all honesty though It's probably fine. Big cities have repetition like that in them.

Edited August 16, 2015 by Avera9eJoe

PLEASE, GENTLEMANS, HELP ME, I'M SERIOUS.

I would like to make a... ....ing epic video on KSP with RVE, but... I have already installed this mod, work.. almost perfectly.

For some reason, I was obliged to format my computer, now, I would like re-install this mother....ing epic mod and make my video.. but, I totaly forget, how. I searched many tutorials on Interdit, on Reddit, but.. my result it's not the same like before...

So, let's try again and tell me how I can install properly this mod, from the begining please sirs, help me.

Look I have already made with KSP :

I want the same result as on the pictures posted above !!!

Gentlemans, help me, please !!

PLEASE, GENTLEMANS, HELP ME, I'M SERIOUS.

I would like to make a... ....ing epic video on KSP with RVE, but... I have already installed this mod, work.. almost perfectly.

For some reason, I was obliged to format my computer, now, I would like re-install this mother....ing epic mod and make my video.. but, I totaly forget, how. I searched many tutorials on Interdit, on Reddit, but.. my result it's not the same like before...

So, let's try again and tell me how I can install properly this mod, from the begining please sirs, help me.

Look I have already made with KSP :

I want the same result as on the pictures posted above !!!

Gentlemans, help me, please !!

Download this: https://github.com/Pingopete/RVE-KSP-1.0.4

Put "RVE" and "EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements" in GameData

Put "sharedassets9.assets" in KSP_Data

Edited August 17, 2015 by Shurikeeen

Download this: https://github.com/Pingopete/RVE-KSP-1.0.4

Put "RVE" and "EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements" in GameData

Put "sharedassets9.assets" in KSP_Data

I love you. I had been looking for this for a while with no luck. Thank you.

Yes, but my result is not like you.

I would say, from the very, very begining, when I just dowloaded KSP, what can I do ? Download in first Real Solar System ? EVE ? Realism Overhaul ?

Yes, but my result is not like you.

I would say, from the very, very begining, when I just dowloaded KSP, what can I do ? Download in first Real Solar System ? EVE ? Realism Overhaul ?

It does not matter in what order you install them. You do not need to install EVE at all.

the night cities are looking great!!!! the repetition is not bad at all pete, it looks great!!!!

The not so finished city-night texture. Honestly the hardest part to modding RVE is the damn cities, finding a balance between what looks acceptable from 1 but also 130km without repetition and without an 8k texture D:

http://i.imgur.com/nSSSbPt.png

You can see the pixelation issue and the repetition here:

http://i.imgur.com/Q3sDOyO.png

EDIT: How do you guys feel about this much repetition? Is that acceptable or should I keep experimenting?

The pixelation will show in very large urban areas like Los Angeles but it might not be so bad. Need to try it out. Small cities like what you show here looks okay since they are not a very large continuous block. I had this issue with the terrain image repeat over a large area as well in my mod. If you look in the Overhaul archive I suggested also a four texture 90 degree rotated texture that is randomly placed. Perhaps if you also tell rbray this idea he might consider it.

You download my mod

You download my mod

Sooner266 SweetFX will fix all my problems ?

Okay, it's work, now, how can add Scatterer with RVE ?

Edited August 18, 2015 by Kakahuete

Sooner266 SweetFX will fix all my problems ?

Okay, it's work, now, how can add Scatterer with RVE ?

You just put Scatterer in GameData like you would do normally.
